article_title: Marianna police search for suspects in drug store robbery
article_text:
Around 4:39 a.m. Sunday officers with the Marianna Police Department responded to a burglar alarm at Paramore’s Pharmacy, on 5th Avenue in Marianna.

Upon arrival, officers located a broken glass door leading into the interior of the business. Officers cleared the building and were unable to locate any suspects inside. During the investigation it was determined that a large amount of several different types of prescription medication was taken. This incident is currently under investigation by the Marianna Police Department.

The Marianna Police Department is asking if anyone has any information in reference to this burglary to please contact the Marianna Police Department at 850-526-3125 or CrimeStoppers at 850-526-5000.

article_metadata.description: The Marianna Police Department is currently investigating a robbery that occurred early Sunday morning at Paramore's Pharmacy in Marianna.
